appropriations: The bill appropriates an unspecified sum out of the general revenues of the State of Hawaii for fiscal year 2025-2026 and for fiscal year 2026-2027. [11] The Committee on Ways and Means has amended this measure by changing the appropriations to unspecified amounts to facilitate further discussion on the measure. [12]
agency_impact: Your Committee notes that the Department of Health requests $221,788 (HB727_SD2_SSCR1531_.htm.txt) to support the Kona division pilot program. [12] This request includes $145,000 (HB727_SD2_SSCR1531_.htm.txt) for one full-time equivalent (1.0 FTE) Clinical Psychologist and $76,788 (HB727_SD2_SSCR1531_.htm.txt) for one full-time equivalent (1.0 FTE) Social Worker or Human Services professional. [12]
six_year_fiscal_implications: Appropriations for the women's court pilot program for fiscal year 2025-2026 and fiscal year 2026-2027 have been changed to unspecified amounts. [11] This change was made to facilitate further discussion on the measure. [12]
updates_from_previous_fiscal_note: The Committee has amended this measure by changing the appropriations to unspecified amounts to facilitate further discussion on the measure. [12] This removes the specific funding that was previously appropriated for fiscal years 2025-2026 and 2026-2027. [11]
